title: （我願榮光歸香港）唱到既英文歌詞 (Version 2)

replies.msg:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y7yRDOLCy4Y

之前係音樂台Post，見到好似有人係度Post左個佢地個翻譯，我都Post在此做比較

老實講，片入面的英文歌詞真吾係好唱得，所以自己做左一個比較流利D既翻譯：

我願榮光歸香港
To the Glory of Hong Kong

何以 這土地 淚再流
Why should our tears fall on the land?
何以 令眾人 亦憤恨
Why should anger run in our band?
昂首 拒默沉 吶喊聲 響透
Arise, once again, let our voice ring out:
盼自由 歸於 這裡
Liberty will come about!

何以 這恐懼 抹不走
When fear makes its stain on our land,
何以 為信念 從沒退後
When truth calls to us, come out and stand!
何解 血在流 但邁進聲 響透
When blood flows throughout, yet still our voices stay and shout,
建自由 光輝 香港
“Free and glo-rious Hong Kong!”

在晚星 墜落 徬徨午夜
Let the stars be dark, let night be long,
迷霧裡 最遠處吹來 號 角 聲
From the mist emerges now our Bat-tle Song:
"捍自由 來齊集這裡 來全力抗對
“Soldier On! Let all come as one, let all fight as one;
勇氣 智慧 也永不滅"
Our soul and spirit never fade!”

黎明來到 要光復 這香港
Bring on the dawn: Liberate our Hong Kong!
同行兒女 為正義 時代革命
Comrade of mine: Revolution of Our Time!
祈求民主 與自由 萬世都 不朽
To freedom and lib-er-ty; forever we fight for thee!
我願榮 光歸香港
To the glor-y of Hong Kong!
香港人頂住

元朗9.9七點半有人鏈

自己寫咗個英文version，唔知大家覺得可唔可以？

Our tears seep through this weeping land,
Our ears hear the raging of men.
We rise and we cry a-front our stand,
Let this land be free again!

Our fears, though they stayed like a wraith,
The years never stopped our rooted faith!
Our chants ring aloud along the bloodied path,
Build this land o’er our wrath!

‘Tis the night stars fall and all seem lost,
Heed the horn, amidst the haze and through the skies!
We gather for freedom and rights, no matter the cost,
Our strength and wisdom never dies!

Our dawn has come, let us write the pages!
For our home, revolution of the ages!
For our men, by our men ere the end of time,
For the rise of Hong Kong’s prime!


我覺得呢個version 啲詞填得仲神喎
吾你老母
